H0.text: What type of animal is a nyala. Gazelle

H1.text: What type of animal is a nyala. Deer

H2.text: What type of animal is a nyala. Impala

H3.text: What type of animal is a nyala. Antelope

A4.text: The lowland nyala or simply nyala (Tragelaphus angasii) is a spiral-horned artiodactyl antelope native to Southern Africa.

A5.text: The nyala is a spiral-horned and middle-sized antelope, between a bushbuck and a kudu.
